meanings.definition: A small wheel at the rear of an aircraft to support the tail when on the ground.
meanings.sent1: The pilot carefully inspected the tailwheel before takeoff.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic replaced the worn tailwheel on the airplane.
meanings.sent3: The curious squirrel mistook the tailwheel for a nut and tried to bury it.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was the tailwheel that kept the project moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The shiny tailwheel gleamed in the sunlight, catching everyone's attention.
